Method Detail

clearCombination

public void clearCombination(string testname)
clear out the combination for a given test

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the variations for.

createTestCombinationCookieKey

private string createTestCombinationCookieKey(string testName)
create the key for the cookie, that stores the current users variation and id

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test.

deserialiseCombination

private struct deserialiseCombination(string testname)
deserialise the combination, and store it in a thread local object so it doesn't need to be deserialised on every call.
Call this before calling getID() or getCombination()

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to deserialise

getCombination

public struct getCombination(string testname)
get the current visitor combination. If an inactive visitor, returns an empty struct.

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the variations for.

getID

public string getID(string testname)
get the current visitor ID

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the combinations for.

returns a preview combination

create the request scope key for storing deserialised combos

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to deserialise

hasCombination

public boolean hasCombination(string testname)
Whether or not the current visitor has been assigned an id and a combination yet

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test we are looking at.

setCombination

public void setCombination(string testname, string id, struct combination)
set the combination for the current visitor

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the combinations for.
id - the id to set
combination - The combination to set
